snippet: Coach Mike Woodson and General Manager Glen Grunwald did not comment Sunday on the Knicks allowing Landry Fields to leave the team. Toronto General Manager Bryan Colangelo did however speak about Fields, his newest acquisition.
abstract: Coach Mike Woodson and General Manager Glen Grunwald did not comment Sunday on the Knicks allowing Landry Fields to leave the team. Toronto General Manager Bryan Colangelo did however speak about Fields, his newest acquisition.
